member.summary: Unique per type, e.g OrderNo

member.summary: Unique per instance, e.g. ProductNo in the Order.

member.summary: Creates batches of items with Guid Ids. All items will be assigned a new Sequential Guid Id.

member.summary: Performs the ADO.Net communication for the Sql-provider for a specific database.

member.summary: Extracts Id-value from sent item, and returns an . If the SisoId member of item, does not contain a value, an exception is thrown.

member.name: T:SisoDb.Providers.SqlProvider.DbSchema.SqlDbUniquesSchemaSynchronizer
member.summary: Delete records that represents an unique for a column that has been dropped in the key-value table for Uniques.

member.name: T:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase
member.summary: Represents a database. An instance of a database is designed for being long lived, since it contains cache for structure schemas etc.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.EnsureNewDatabase
member.summary: Ensures that a new fresh database will exists. Drops any existing database.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.CreateIfNotExists
member.summary: Creates and initializes a new database if one does not exist.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.InitializeExisting
member.summary: Initializes an existing database by creating Siso-system tables.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.DeleteIfExists
member.summary: Deletes the databse if it exists.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.Exists
member.summary: Checks if the database exists.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.DropStructureSet``1
member.summary: Drops the structure set, meaning all tables associated with the structure type.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.UpsertStructureSet``1
member.summary: Manually upserts a structure set, meaning all tables for the structure type will be created.
member.remarks: This is normally something you do not need to do. This is done automatically.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.UpdateStructureSet``2(System.Func{``0,``1,SisoDb.StructureSetUpdaterStatuses})
member.summary: Lets you handle complex model updates.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.CreateQueryEngine
member.summary: Creates a NON Transactional used for searching. Is designed for being short lived. Create, consume and dispose.

member.name: M:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.CreateUnitOfWork
member.summary: Creates a Transactional UnitOfWork , which is designed for being shortlived. Create, consume and dispose.

member.name: P:SisoDb.ISisoDatabase.Name
member.summary: The name of the database.

member.summary: Connection info for the Server.

member.summary: Connection info for the database.

member.summary: Cached structure schemas.

member.summary: Structure builder used to build structures for insert and updates.

member.name: T:SisoDb.IUnitOfWork
member.summary: All operations within the unit of work are transactional. Use to make your changes persistant.

member.name: M:SisoDb.IUnitOfWork.Commit
member.summary: Commits your changes to the database. After a commit you can continue to work with your UnitOfWork. You do not have to create a new instance of your UnitOfWork, as it will reset it self.

member.name: M:SisoDb.IUnitOfWork.Insert``1(``0)
member.summary: Inserts a single structure using the as the contract for the structure being inserted.
member.typeparam: Structure type, used as a contract defining the scheme.

member.name: M:SisoDb.IUnitOfWork.InsertJson``1(System.String)
member.summary: Inserts Json strcutures using the as the contract for the structure being inserted.
member.remarks: Deserialization of the Json structure will take place, so If you do have the instace pass that instead using other overload!

member.name: M:SisoDb.IUnitOfWork.InsertMany``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0})
member.summary: Inserts multiple structures using the as the contract for the structures being inserted.
member.typeparam: Structure type, used as a contract defining the scheme.

member.summary: Inserts multiple Json strcutures using the as the contract for the structures being inserted.
member.remarks: Deserialization of the Json structures will take place, so If you do have the instace pass that instead using other overload!

member.name: T:SisoDb.Cryptography.Crc32Algorithm
member.summary: http://damieng.com/blog/2006/08/08/calculating_crc32_in_c_and_net

member.name: F:SisoDb.Providers.SqlProvider.DbSchema.SchemaChanges.IsMissingColumn
member.summary: Exists in the structure-schema but not in db, hence it should be added to the db.

member.name: F:SisoDb.Providers.SqlProvider.DbSchema.SchemaChanges.IsObsoleteColumn
member.summary: Exists in db but not in structure-schema, hence it should be removed from the database.

member.name: T:SisoDb.Providers.SqlProvider.DbSchema.SqlDbIndexesSchemaSynchronizer
member.summary: Adds missing columns and Drops obsolete columns; to Indexes-table.
member.remarks: The table must exist, otherwise an Exception is thrown!

member.name: P:SisoDb.Querying.Lambdas.Parsers.WhereParser.IsFlatteningMembers
member.summary: Due to SisoDb is flattening object hierarchies items that are enumerable will be denormalized and store many values as string in one field. This means when using enumerables in a lambda the sub-members needs to use the complete hierarchy of the members in the lambda.

member.name: T:SisoDb.SequentialGuid
member.summary: http://www.shirmanov.com/2010/05/generating-newsequentialid-compatible.html

member.name: T:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.AutoSchemaBuilder_MissingIdMember
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Item of type '{0}' has no Id member specified. A Guid or Int property named 'Id' was expected..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.AutoSchemaBuilder_MissingIndexableMembers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Item of type '{0}' has no members that are indexable. There's no point in storing items that has nothing to index..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.AutoSchemaBuilder_UnsupportedIdAccessorType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The id property: '{0}'; is not of suported type. Only Guid and Int is accepted..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.AzureDatabase_UnsupportedProviderSpecified
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Storageprovider '{0}' is unsupported. When consuming an Azure-database the storageprovider should be: '{1}'..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.DbSchemaUpserter_Upsert_IdTypeNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The IdType '{0}' is not supported when upserting tables!.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.ExpressionEvaluator_EvaluateMemberExpression_NotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Direct memberaccess of node: '{0}'; with with membertype: '{1}'; is not supported!.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.ExpressionUtils_GetRightMostMember_NoMemberFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No MemberExpression found in expression: '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Sortings has allready been initialized..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You must provide an unique guid to the GuidId..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.Id_IdentityIsOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You must provide a positive identity..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.IdAccessor_GetIdValue_InvalidLevel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Id values must lie on the root object..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Property.PropertyType '{0}' is not supported by the IdAccessor..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.Index_IsMissingName

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Operator '{0}' is not supported!.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.LambdaParser_MemberIsBytes
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Byte arrays are not supported for member: '{0}'..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.LambdaParser_NoMemberExpressions
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You cant only access a member in a query expression, you need to compare it against something. Eg. (x => x.HasItems) should be (x => x.HasItems == true).

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.LambdaParser_UnsupportedMethodCall
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not evaluate the method call: '{0}'. Specific supported method exists as extensionmethods and are prefixed with 'Qx'. Import namespace 'SisoDb.Querying' to enable them..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Conversion of values in expression is only allowed for nullable valuetypes..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.LambdaParser_VisitUnary_NotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The unary operator '{0}' is not supported..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The node of type: '{0}' is not supported!.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Where expression has allready been initialized..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.SqlUnitOfWork_DoIdentityInsert_RootItemsMissmatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The number of passed root items is not equal to the number of inserted root items!.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.SqlUnitOfWork_NoItemExistsForUpdate
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is no '{0}'-structure to update matching the sent Id '{1}'..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.StringConverter_AsString_TypeOfValueIsNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value being retrieved is not of supported type. It must either be a string or the type needs to implement IConvertible or if Nullable<T>, then T needs to implement it..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.Structure_DuplicateUniques
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Duplicate Unique-index found for '{0}'.\r\nSisoId: '{1}';Name: '{2}';Value: '{3}';.

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.StructureIndex_ValueArgument_IncorrectType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Only strings and valuetypes can be stored as indexes..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.StructureIndexesFactory_UniqueIndex_IsNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Unique index '{0}':'{1}' is evaluated to Null. This is not alowed..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.TypeExtensions_ExtractGenericType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Supported generic collections on model are: implementations of either IEnumerable<T> or IList<T>..

member.name: P:SisoDb.Resources.ExceptionMessages.UniqueModesCantBeMapped
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The UniqueModes '{0}' is unknow and cant be mapped..

member.name: F:SisoDb.StructureSetUpdaterStatuses.Keep
member.summary: Indicates that you want to keep the structure and the new-structure will be persisted with the same id as the old.

member.name: F:SisoDb.StructureSetUpdaterStatuses.Trash
member.summary: Indicates that your are no longer interested in keeping the structure, hence it will be deleted.

member.name: F:SisoDb.StructureSetUpdaterStatuses.Abort
member.summary: Abort and rollback the process.

member.name: T:SisoDb.Providers.SqlProvider.SqlServerClient
member.summary: Performs the ADO.Net communication for the Sql-provider and executes command against the server not a specific database.
